availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson, Kentucky, attorney. Brandenburg, Kentucky, native. Son of Stephen Minor Yeaman and Lucretia Helm Yeaman. Established the law firm of H. & M. Yeaman in partnership with Malcolm Yeaman in Henderson in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Edmund Lyne Starling, History of Henderson County, Kentucky (Henderson, Ky.: n.p., 1887), 644-45.
William C. Ferril, ed., Sketches of Colorado in Four Volumes, vol. 1 (Denver: The Western Press Bureau Company, 1911), 193.
Find A Grave, "Harvey Yeaman 1833-1876," Memorial #139311133, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/139311133 (accessed November 29, 2017).
